title: Provides that certain contracts for commercial or industrial projects or multiple dwelling projects shall contain a provision of an OSHA construction safety and heal
summary: Provides that certain contracts for commercial or industrial projects or multiple dwelling projects shall contain a provision requiring certification that laborers, workers, and mechanics working on the project have completed a ten hour OSHA construction safety and health course; provides for a civil penalty for non-compliance.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to providing that contracts for commercial or industrial projects or multiple dwelling projects shall contain a provision that laborers, workers, and mechanics shall be certified as having completed a safety course
